description:
The E-View product is an RGB (Red, Green, Blue) composite based upon data from the SEVIRI instrument. It is dedicated to detailed cloud monitoring of the European region. It is based on data from the SEVIRI High Resolution Visible channel combined with data from the IR10.8 channel that provides the temperature information (blue component).

From 1 June 2022, Meteosat-9 at 45.5° E is the prime satellite for the IODC service, replacing Meteosat-8 (located at 41.5° E while in operation).
title: European HRV RGB - MSG - Indian Ocean

providers.name: European Organisation for the Exploitation of Meteorological Satellites (EUMETSAT)
